actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to provide for an application process for interested parties to apply for a county to be designated as a rural area, and for other purposes.
short_title: CFPB Rural Designation Petition and Correction Act

titles.title: CFPB Rural Designation Petition and Correction Act

To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to provide for an application process for interested parties to apply for a county to be designated as a rural area, and for other purposes.
